A bunch of skin related work items and bug fixes.
SDK-19961 - The ControlBar default contentBackgroundColor in its Spark skin needs to be updated.
SDK-19659 - Indeterminate Halo ProgressBar with Gumbo skin draws over the border
SDK-19823 - Halo HSlider and VSlider with Gumbo skins dont look right when specifying track highlight
SDK-19767 - Halo ColorPicker with Spark skin draws stray lines when setting larger width/height
SDK-19764 - enabled and disabled Halo ColorPicker control with Gumbo skins look inconsistent
SDK-20152 - Spark FxPanel container doesnt look very wireframey
SDK-19591 - If you compile FxButtonBar with the wireframe skin, it does not use Wireframe FxToggleButtons
SDK-20151 - wireframe FxList skin item selection highlight looks inconsistent with Spark skins
SDK-20153 - scrollbar position on wireframe FxTextArea skin is inconsistent with scrollbar position on spark FxTextArea skin
SDK-19955 - Spark FxCheckBox skin includes reference to unused namespace, "geom"
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
1st pass of rename according to the spec http://opensource.adobe.com/wiki/display/flexsdk/Dropping+the+Fx+Prefix

Flex now requires CSS Style declarations to declare @namespace rules and disambiguate between halo and spark components using CSS 3 namespace prefixes on type selectors. At compile time, this namespace information will be used to map type names to qualified ActionScript class names. At runtime, type selectors are matched on qualified ActionScript class name (for example mx.controls.Button rather than just Button). Flex 3 applications must be compiled with -compatibility-version=3.0.0 to get unqualified CSS type selector behavior.
QE: Yes, this build may help in updating test cases to use the new namespaces and class names.
